head.title: National Briefing | Washington: Saturday Postal Delivery To Continue

hedline.hl1: National Briefing | Washington: Saturday Postal Delivery To Continue

abstract.p: US Postal Service says it will continue delivering mail six days a week after weighing elimination of Saturday delivery as way of saving money (S)

block.p: The United States Postal Service said it would continue to deliver mail six days a week, after having considered eliminating Saturday delivery as a way of saving money. The proposed service reduction was criticized by members of Congress who said it would inconvenience customers and threaten the economy.
